medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse abdominal pain with associated nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began yesterday evening post-prandially. The diffuse abdominal pain later localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). Nausea and vomiting became persistent around 2 AM but then dissipated. Abdominal pain remains significant but has responded to IV antibiotics and pain medications in the ED.
